topic.title: Please teach me useful links that you like it.
topic.body:
Hello there. My name is c477us, and I'm making a zite.
I'd like to make this site's link collection more and more complete. So, if you have any good sites on ZeroNet/Tor/FreeNet/and SurfaceWeb, please let me know.

*I never put link to a hundred percent illegal sites.
My zite: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DogSf4Z84U3vtFQtrmi6d2pbeNqGSLhTJ/

1611813026_1JprRAdVNFB2etoYRTiT4pnx9qLme.body: for example: anon-tech, security, hacking, linux...
I added some trackers that you can use on Tor :)
I added some hacking forum in "Surface web" in my link collection.

> [qzm](#comment_28_1HyrFrFXUHZC58qLuFrjAXm2Jjkb3Y6ufX): Similar to zero talk but with a much higher cap so you don’t have to delete postshttp://server1.lan:43110/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/

Thank you.
I made topics on the Unlimit Talk:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/?Topic:1611829225_1JprRAdVNFB2etoYRTiT4pnx9qLme3yhB4/Please+teach+me+useful+site+links+that+you+like+it

> [zeroseed4](#comment_30_1HTbdyz4zToxkxfmuYYfNVN1Y3U2yeki1N): My new  filehosting zeronet zite  [...]

Added :-)

I made docs and write about zeronet anonimity for newbies!
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DogSf4Z84U3vtFQtrmi6d2pbeNqGSLhTJ/docs.html

> [weakish](#comment_18_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR): check Sites.ZeroNetwork.bit

Yeah, I know this site. But I want other links like freenet, tor, and more.

Sorry I  made miss to delete my documents...
I reposted now.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DogSf4Z84U3vtFQtrmi6d2pbeNqGSLhTJ/docs.html

Add documents about zeronet setting for newbies.
The title is "Zeronet Basic Configuration"

Sorry, I made some mistakes.
Zeronet is working with VPN, if you're using it with Tor.
I reprint my document.

> [masterlogician](#comment_2_1MW2ZSiMdJJTdhHUbV3ddi7NMdsiqKghX3): I don't even know what a tracker is,i feel dumb, could you enlighten me?

Client = Computer want to connect ZeroNet network.
Tracker = Web service witch responds to requests from clients.
Clients connect to few trackers to search other clients through them. 
Then, they create P2P network.

Okay. Thank you for great intro :)

Of course I did it, but I don't check so much...
If somebody want's to contact me, can get my zeromail address and more in Contact tabs.

1611787253_139pHaxesZa11czwptXVY62ZrNWUh.body:
zonateam, do you know all of the IP address connecting zeronet could see anybody? And if you're not using tor always mode, your raw IP address can leak easily?
If you're using tor always mode, exploring your raw IP is possible for investigating because zeronet couldn't use with the VPN(but could use with proxy). Or, maybe leaked your private information by a JavaScript zeronet support.
If your site has some brittleness? Leaked your info from other place?....

Zeronet's anonymity is no more than torrent, I think you never have to do that hosting illegal contents on here.

Thanks. I don't know whonix wiki explained zeronet.
But you know, zeronet peers are in public. Users are not found as manager/administrator, but maybe as peers.(if they uses raw IP)

And, I have a favor. Somebody on zeronet don't like illegal contents. Talk here is OK, but the other topic that don't talk about illegal content, please don't advertise your zine there like rnb's topic. I hope that.

```
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?zeronet_peers=104.171.122.70:19051,118.158.224.138:17409,151.59.36.148:15441,27.33.17.145:26552,2001:19f0:8001:1d2f:5400:2ff:fe83:5bf7:21543,2401:c080:1000:4203:5400:2ff:fe87:656f:23333,97.88.60.46:36462,175.132.36.154:15441,2a01:4f9:2b:468::2:21775,149.248.37.249:21543,91.131.48.50:22005,45.148.140.160:17791,12.8.82.161:18693,104.171.122.70:19051,107.179.130.92:22701,108.175.228.66:32171,108.49.181.162:22937,108.50.240.201:34519,109.201.143.9:34686,110.185.143.199:15441
```

> [zonateam4622](#comment_50_1Fs7oXqGMju27ZzXFFJn4dLt11yrbg5HKs): I understand about to not Share my site on Any topic who don't ask about that or For that kind of content is ok for me . but when i received insult from X member is difficult to respect them after,  [...]

I apologize if you're hurt by my word.

Zeronet peer's(users/trackers/seeders...) IP address are in public. you wanna see,
1. Left-drug zeronet logos at upper-right, on your zite. (you can see globe)
2. click 'copy to clipboard' at PEERS entry.

And, IP address is set by users Tor-mode setting.
Always -> Onion network IP (connect as Onion)
Enable -> Raw IP (just agree to connect peer using tor network, doesn't hide IP)
Disable -> Raw IP (refuse connection from tor network)

Zeronet only uses bitcoin cryptography for zites Pubkey/PrivKey. So nobody could alter your zite like bitcoin's signature.

Zeronet hide
*Who is the zite Administrator

 Zeronet can't hide
*Who is connecting this zite(IP address that connecting the zite)
So if users want hide themself, use tor and hide IP address.

I made a document about zeronet anonimity on my website. pub key:
1DogSf4Z84U3vtFQtrmi6d2pbeNqGSLhTJ

I already tried riseup VPN, so I want to try other riseup service.
